rules.passive: You hold powerful influence over members of the Rodent family
rules.active: Turn into a member of the rodent family for as long as you choose

details.flavour: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart

rules.active: Become a small hummingbird for as long as you choose

details.flavour: Birds never fail to see the forest from the trees

rules.active: Disable a visible machine until it is repaired

details.flavour: Yeah I'm into tech, into smashing it up that is

rules.passive: You can tame anything you can ride

details.flavour: Man was destined to tame the world
